akn:section.akn:heading: Facilitating submission of applications for admission as a refugee

akn:content.akn:p: § 7843. Facilitating submission of applications for admission as a refugee The Secretary of State shall undertake to facilitate the submission of applications under section 1157 of title 8 by citizens of North Korea seeking protection as refugees (as defined in section 1101(a)(42) of title 8). (Pub. L. 108–333, title III, § 303, Oct. 18, 2004, 118 Stat. 1296.)
